title: Multi-biocatalytic system for the effective fumarate synthesis from pyruvate and gaseous CO2

Unsaturated dicarboxylic acid, fumarate is an important material to produce unsaturated polyester resins and biodegradable plastics. Fumarate synthesised from petroleum-derived benzene and butane as starting materials, is expected to be...
